short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sport Street Is designed to help sports fans customize their new tab experience..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sport street is a chrome extension that will let sports users customize their new tab with a set of beautiful backgrounds including showing top sites just exactly like the regular new tab in addition to that it will not change your default search engine which is Google.

With a huge selection of customized backgrounds you will be able to make the new tab exactly as you wish it to be adding a sports feeling to it!
